title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993), and for the purpose
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Producer Prices Survey)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Producer Prices Survey) 

Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited statistic (producer price survey) order 2023

title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993), and for the purpose
heading: 2. (1) In this Order –
text_raw:
2. (1) In this Order – 

“Act of 1993” means the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993); 

“monthly reference day” has the meaning assigned to it by Article 6; 

“quarter” means a period of 3 months ending on 31 March, 30 June, 30 
September or 31 December in any year; 

“quarterly reference day” has the meaning assigned to it by Article 7; 

“Regulation” means Regulation (EU) 2019/2152 of the European Parliament 
and of the Council of 27 November 20191 as amended by Commission 
Delegated Regulation (EU) 2021/1704 of 14 July 20212; 

“Regulation (EC) No. 1893/2006” means Regulation (EC) No. 1893/2006 of 
the European Parliament and of the Council of 20 December 20063 as amended 
by Regulation (EC) No. 295/2008 of the European Parliament and of the 
Council of 11 March 20084, Regulation (EU) No. 70/2012 of the European 
Parliament and of the Council of 18 January 20125 and Regulation (EU) 
2019/1243 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 20 June 20196; 

“survey” means the Producer Prices Survey that is conducted by the Central 
Statistics Office for the purposes of obtaining information set out in the 
Schedule for the purposes of compliance with the Regulation, in so far as it 
relates to Annexes I to V thereto. 

(2) A word or expression that is used in this Order and also used in the 
Regulation has the same meaning in this Order as in the Regulation, except 
where the context otherwise requires.

text_raw:

title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993), and for the purpose
heading: 4. A requirement on an undertaking that is classified for statistical
text_raw:
4. A requirement on an undertaking that is classified for statistical 

purposes under – 

(a) 

(b) 

section B (other than class 7.21), C (other than class 24.46 or 
group 25.4, 30.1, 30.3 or 30.4) or D or division 36, or 

section G (other than division 47), H, I, J, K, L, M, N, P, Q, R or 
S, 

of NACE Rev. 2 set out in Annex I to Regulation (EC) No. 1893/2006 to 
provide for the purposes of the survey the information specified in paragraphs 
1(b), (c) and 2 of the Schedule is hereby prescribed.

title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993), and for the purpose
heading: 5. A requirement on an undertaking that is classified for statistical
text_raw:
5. A requirement on an undertaking that is classified for statistical 
purposes under section F of NACE Rev. 2 set out in Annex I to Regulation 
(EC) No. 1893/2006 to provide for the purposes of the survey the information 
set out in paragraphs 1(d) and 2 of the Schedule is hereby prescribed.
text_norm: 5 requirement undertaking classified statistical purpose section f nace rev 2 set annex regulation (ec) no 1893 2006 provide purpose survey information set paragraph 1(d) 2 schedule hereby prescribed

title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993), and for the purpose
heading: 6. The undertakings in relation to which a requirement to provide
text_raw:
6. The undertakings in relation to which a requirement to provide 
information is prescribed in Article 3 or 4(a) shall provide the information 
referred to in Article 3 or 4(a), as the case may be, in relation to the 15th day of 
each month (in this Order referred to as the “monthly reference day”) in the 
period from January 2023 to December 2027, monthly in relation to the 
immediately preceding monthly reference day.
text_norm: 6 undertaking relation requirement provide information prescribed article 3 4(a) shall provide information referred article 3 4(a) case may relation 15th day month (in order referred monthly reference day ) period january 2023 december 2027 monthly relation immediately preceding monthly reference day

title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993), and for the purpose
heading: 7. The undertakings in relation to which a requirement to provide
text_raw:
7. The undertakings in relation to which a requirement to provide 
information is prescribed in Article 4(b) or 5 shall provide the information 
referred to in Article 4(b) or 5, as the case may be, in relation to the 15th day of 
the second month in each quarter (in this Order referred to as the “quarterly 
reference day”) in the period from 1 January 2023 to 31 December 2027, 
quarterly in relation to the immediately preceding quarterly reference day.
text_norm: 7 undertaking relation requirement provide information prescribed article 4(b) 5 shall provide information referred article 4(b) 5 case may relation 15th day second month quarter (in order referred quarterly reference day ) period 1 january 2023 31 december 2027 quarterly relation immediately preceding quarterly reference day

title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993), and for the purpose
heading: 8. The Statistics (Producer Prices Survey) Order 2019 (S.I. No. 566 of
text_raw:
8. The Statistics (Producer Prices Survey) Order 2019 (S.I. No. 566 of 

2019) is revoked.

title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993), and for the purpose
heading: Articles 3, 4 and 5

title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993), and for the purpose
heading: Information regarding the following, as it relates to the undertaking
text_raw:
1. 

Information regarding the following, as it relates to the undertaking 
concerned, and specifying the monthly reference day or quarterly reference 
day, as the case may be, to which the information relates: 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

the purchase price of goods or services purchased in or outside 
the State by the undertaking; 

the sale price of goods or services sold in or outside the State by 
the undertaking; 

the following particulars in respect of the goods and services 
referred to in subparagraph (a) or (b), as the case may be: 

(i) 

a description of the goods or services; 

(ii) 

(iii) 

(iv) 

(v) 

the terms of purchase or sale, as the case may be, of the 
goods or services; 

the country of purchase or sale, as the case may be, of the 
goods or services; 

the discount or surcharges applied to the purchase or sale, 
as the case may be, of the goods or services; 

the currency of purchase or sale, as the case may be, of the 
goods or services; 

(d) 

the sale price of materials sold in or outside the State by the 
undertaking.

title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993), and for the purpose
heading: Information on the time taken by the undertaking concerned to
text_raw:
2. 

Information on the time taken by the undertaking concerned to 
complete the form, questionnaire or other record prepared by the Director 
General for the collection of the information referred to in paragraph 1. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

9 January, 2023. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Taoiseach.
